Class BlackjackInstance

java.lang.Object
blackjack.BlackjackInstance
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BlackjackInstance extends Object implements Serializable
This is a class used for saving and loading, and it is an instance of a Blackjack game
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • BlackjackInstance

      public BlackjackInstance(Deck d, Hand p1, Hand p2, Hand dealer, int p1money, int p2money, int p1bet, int p2bet, boolean isGameOver, int turn, boolean p1Done, boolean p2Done, String p1Name, String p2Name)
      Constructor for the class
      Parameters:
      d - deck object
      p1 - player 1 hand
      p2 - player 2 hand
      dealer - dealer hand
      p1money - player 1 money
      p2money - player 2 money
      p1bet - player 1 bet
      p2bet - player 2 bet
      isGameOver - boolean representing whether game is over or not
      turn - int representing the current turn
      p1Done - boolean representing whether player 1 is done
      p2Done - boolean representing whether player 2 is done
      p1Name - player 1 name
      p2Name - player 2 name

      public int getTurn()
      Gets current turn
      Returns:

      Gets status of player 1
      Returns:
